name: lambda-boilerplate
description: Build & ship AWS λ app with ease

scripts.build: BUILD_NODE_VERSION=$(head -1 .node-version | awk '{split($0,a,"."); print a[1]}'); esbuild ts/lambda/*.ts --bundle --minify --platform=node --target=node${BUILD_NODE_VERSION} --external:aws-sdk --external:@aws-sdk --outdir=build
scripts.watch: BUILD_NODE_VERSION=$(head -1 .node-version | awk '{split($0,a,"."); print a[1]}'); esbuild ts/lambda/*.ts --bundle --minify --platform=node --target=node${BUILD_NODE_VERSION} --external:aws-sdk --external:@aws-sdk --outdir=build --watch
scripts.indocker: BUILD_NODE_VERSION=$(head -1 .node-version | awk '{split($0,a,"."); print a[1]}'); docker run --rm -v ${PWD}/build:/var/task:ro,delegated -p 9000:8080 --env-file .env/${FUNCTION}/docker.env amazon/aws-lambda-nodejs:${BUILD_NODE_VERSION} ${FUNCTION}.handler

author: François Masclef
